tooltip.cybernetics.section.head: Head
tooltip.cybernetics.mk1_optics.descripti: A basic cybernetic eye system. Displays information about the user's _stored energy_ and _rejection_, as well as _nearby mob health_.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk2_optics.descripti: An upgraded cybernetic eye system. Along with the effects of the Mk1, it allows the user to _scan nearby mobs_, highlighting them.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk3_optics.descripti: A advanced cybernetic eye system.  Along with the effects of the Mk2, it allows the user to
tooltip.cybernetics.night_vision_eyes.de: An augment to any optics, allowing for _perfect vision_ even in _total darkness_.
tooltip.cybernetics.fire_resistance_skin: A thin layer of heat-proof plating embedded into the skin. Renders the user _immune to fire_ and other _extreme heat_.
A replacement for much of the user's skeleton, significantly increasing its _durability_ and _sturdiness_. Gives the user permanent _+2 armor_.
tooltip.cybernetics.titanium_skeleton.de: A significantly stronger replacement for the user's skeleton, made of pure _titanium_. Gives the user permanent _+5 armor_ and _+2 armor toughness_.
tooltip.cybernetics.emergency_defibrilla:
An emergency AED unit that will restart the heart in cases of sudden trauma. _Revives_ the user _once_ when they die, giving them temporary _regeneration_ and some health back.
Cooldown: _2 minutes_
tooltip.cybernetics.oxygen_recycler.desc: A mechanical pump connected directly to the lungs, allowing the body to save oxygen produced elsewhere to maintain the user's breath. Gives a _75%_ chance to _not consume air bubbles_. Stacks with Respiration.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk1_berserk.descript:
A chip implanted into the user's brain, heightening their senses temporarily. When activated, the user enters a state of _rage_, giving the following effects: 
- _Resistance 4_
- _Regeneration_
- _+30% speed_
- _+70% attack speed_
Duration: _10 seconds_.
Cooldown: _1 minute._
tooltip.cybernetics.mk2_berserk.descript:
A chip implanted into the user's brain, moderately heightening their senses temporarily. When activated, the user enters a state of _rage_, giving the following effects: 
- _Resistance 4_
- _Regeneration_
- _+30% speed_
- _+70% attack speed_
- _+3 damage_ with fists.
Duration: _12 seconds_.
Cooldown: _50 seconds._
tooltip.cybernetics.mk3_berserk.descript:
A chip implanted into the user's brain, significantly heightening their senses temporarily. When activated, the user enters a state of _rage_, giving the following effects: 
- _Resistance 4_
- _Regeneration 2_
- _+30% speed_
- _+70% attack speed_
- _+5 damage_ with fists.
Duration: _15 seconds_.
Cooldown: _45 seconds._
